name: CAPropertyAnimation
desc: An abstract subclass of CAAnimation for creating animations that manipulate the value of layer properties.

items.name: var keyPath: String?
items.desc: Specifies the key path the receiver animates.

items.name: var isCumulative: Bool
items.desc: Determines if the value of the property is the value at the end of the previous repeat cycle, plus the value of the current repeat cycle.

items.name: var isAdditive: Bool
items.desc: Determines if the value specified by the animation is added to the current render tree value to produce the new render tree value.

items.name: var valueFunction: CAValueFunction?
items.desc: An optional value function that is applied to interpolated values.

items.name: init(keyPath: String?)
items.desc: Creates and returns an CAPropertyAnimation instance for the specified key path.
